    • Constructor Detail

      • EmailTemplateRecipient

        public EmailTemplateRecipient(InternetAddress email)
        Create a new recipient. As a convenience this will populate the first name and last name for a PrincipalInternetAddress if the Principal has a first and last name along with the principal.
        Parameters:
        email - the email address.
